Articles.Content: Hello, Kerbal Community. I am Jack--I mean Deek of Rocketry. *ahem* I am not new to KSP, but I am new to the forums and such. The first version of KSP I played was .9 I'm pretty sure. Well, it's a pleasure to be here and I look forward to getting into the swing of things and making Jeb very, very happy.
Since pirate captains seem to be in short supply at the moment, allow me to welcome you to the forum. Uh, welcome to the forum.
Welcome to the forums Deek hope you enjoy your stay

Welcome to the forums Deek of Rocketry.

You must be good at KSP now, I still haven't tried to get to Minmus.

Hope you enjoy your stay here and discuss KSP.

Hi Deek of Rocketry, welcome to the community

0.17 is a lot different to .9, have fun with the planets and planes
Oh trust me, i have been. I'll put pics up soon.
